content.raw:
Thanks for the quick reply.
I simplified my robot model, so that i can send it to you, but now i'am unable to replicate bug 1. I will try it tomorrow again...

I have investigated bug 2 a bit more, and it seems that it only happens on models, which have meshes for collision. If i try to build a similar ramp out of simple boxes, everything works good. I have uploaded a second [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5O6IGyxtvx0), where you can see a similar behavior, caused by other obstacles. I have uploaded the used sdf model in my [dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/x3ww19b4pqri3dp/AAByE6Dtp_C9T7QCJaHbIWM-a?dl=0), you can find it in the "object_robocup_metalbar" folder. I also uploaded my robot model, it it is written as a xacro xml file and launched by "getjag_new/launch/getjag_world.launch". Your can also see the source code, which i modified, located in "getjag_new/src/"  - I don't think the inertia or weight is causing this issue, because i tested the same robot with wheels, behaving normal. I guess it has something to do with my meshes, used for the collision, but then it would also affect the wheeled version...
content.html:
Thanks for the quick reply. I simplified my robot model, so that i can send it to you, but now i'am unable to replicate bug 1. I will try it tomorrow again...

I have investigated bug 2 a bit more, and it seems that it only happens on models, which have meshes for collision. If i try to build a similar ramp out of simple boxes, everything works good. I have uploaded a second video, where you can see a similar behavior, caused by other obstacles. I have uploaded the used sdf model in my dropbox, you can find it in the "object_robocup_metalbar" folder. I also uploaded my robot model, it it is written as a xacro xml file and launched by "getjag_new/launch/getjag_world.launch". Your can also see the source code, which i modified, located in "getjag_new/src/" - I don't think the inertia or weight is causing this issue, because i tested the same robot with wheels, behaving normal. I guess it has something to do with my meshes, used for the collision, but then it would also affect the wheeled version...
